text: Pippa Middleton first made headlines when she wore that unforgettable white dress to sister Kate Middleton ’ s 2011 royal wedding. Since then, the two have been spotted together many times. But their relationship might not be as close as it seems, and it ’ s definitely not as close as it once was. The two sisters were extremely close growing up Did these two sisters drift apart? | Christopher Furlong / Getty Images Did these two sisters drift apart? | Christopher Furlong / Getty Images Kate and Pippa Middleton are less than two years apart. Growing up, the sisters were best friends. The girls grew up with their parents and brother and spent nearly every day together — the two were also very close with their younger brother, James Middleton. Kate has said that she wants to recreate the family dynamic
